Posts.EditableText: I have a couple of old version of games that don't open properly on quest 5.4.1.  No tabs showed or hyperlinks behave like this "object: thing". Is there a fix for this?
Posts.HTML: I have a couple of old version of games that don't open properly on quest 5.4.1.  No tabs showed or hyperlinks behave like this "object: thing". Is there a fix for this?

Posts.EditableText: This is an aslx file right? You just need to re-save it so it gets the latest ASL version header, as you're running it against the 5.4 core libraries.
Posts.HTML: This is an aslx file right? You just need to re-save it so it gets the latest ASL version header, as you're running it against the 5.4 core libraries.

Posts.EditableText: After saving with the last Quest the code changes to the last version but the right screen is still not showing (no tabs), so we can't edit the game...
Posts.HTML: After saving with the last Quest the code changes to the last version but the right screen is still not showing (no tabs), so we can't edit the game...

Posts.EditableText: I've seen that if I try to open the published form of a game. Not sure if that's relevant, but it's all I've got.
